## Figure outputs

```{r}
#' Plot distributions of value
#'
#' @param data 
#'
#' @return a plot figure
plot_distributions <- function(data) {
  ggplot2::ggplot(data, aes(x = value)) +
    ggplot2::geom_histogram() +
    ggplot2::facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
}
```
